thread.title: Manchester City & Monaco set Champions League record
thread.title_full: Manchester City & Monaco set Champions League record

title: Manchester City & Monaco set Champions League record
text:
Feb 21, 2017 23:04:53 The two sides made European football history on Tuesday in their eight-goal thriller 
Manchester City and Monaco took part in a Champions League match for the ages on Tuesday, and they made some history in the process. 
Citizens complete comeback in eight-goal thriller 
City came back to defeat the Ligue 1 side 5-3 in their round-of-16 first leg at the Etihad Stadium, as Sergio Aguero scored a pair in the second half. 
With eight strikes combined, the teams set a record for the most total goals in a Champions League knockout round first leg. 8 - Manchester City 5-3 Monaco is the highest scoring first leg ever in a Champions League knockout tie. Bonanza. The teams will be back at it in an encore performance on March 15 at the Stade Louis II in Monaco. Related
